name: Orbital Fabricators
desc:
An array of semi-autonomous manufacturies sit in low orbit above $market. These fabricators are a testament to the unfathomable industrial might of the Domain. A handful of droneports, scattered throughout the volume, act as distribution hubs for the massive amount of materials and products passing through the system.
The fabricators, while not capable of independent production, can be linked up to local heavy industry to greatly increase output.

name: Militant Population
desc: The company's violent, sometimes desperate, history has cultivated a militant population; one that sees violence not as an aberration but rather as a solution. Small arms are ubiquitous and most of the populace is armed at least in part against the threat of violence from both within and outside the company.

name: Ship Graveyards
desc:
Graveyards of broken, decommissioned hulls are scattered across the surface of $market.
The remains can be picked through and refurbished to provide a steady but relatively small supply of ships.
